type: Legendary Creature – Human Elder Knight Mercenary
rules_text:
[i]Greil's Deputy[/i] – You play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play land cards from the top of your library.
[i]Mercenary Surveying[/i] – Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. If its a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. You may play the exiled card this turn.
